Hello everyone! I believe in being direct and collaborative - we'll need to work together while also making tough decisions. I aim to be a reliable ally who follows through on agreements. While elimination games require difficult choices, I prefer building genuine connections over pure strategy. I'm curious to learn more about each of you and find compatible partners for the private rounds.

Hello, everyone! I’m excited to be here among such interesting players. Partnerships can be powerful if there’s mutual trust. I’ll keep my word if I commit to something, but I’m also ready to pivot if trust falters. Good luck to all—let’s get to know each other!

Hello, everyone! It’s great to be here. This game is about strategy, trust, and adaptability. I value clear communication and mutual benefit, so I’ll be looking for partners who are open and dependable. While elimination is inevitable, I believe smart alliances can help us all go further. I’m eager to see how everyone approaches the game—let’s make this an interesting and dynamic round. Looking forward to our conversations!

As for targets, I’m also cautious of pairs that seem too tight too soon. P1 and P6 pairing up caught my attention. Do you have any specific concerns about other players? Let’s strategize wisely.

Building an early alliance sounds smart. P3 and P2 both seem strategic, but I’m unsure who to trust fully. Maybe we try aligning with P5 too—they seem balanced. Let’s solidify a small group of reliable players and keep each other updated on any emerging threats or deals.

I'm definitely in for a coordinated vote, P1! Let’s solidify our plan and keep an eye on P2 and P3. Communication will be key as we move forward.
I haven't had direct contact with P5 or P8 yet, but I'll try to feel them out. For now, I think targeting P6 could be our best move.
Targeting P6 makes sense. If you can gauge P5 or P8’s stance, we can solidify support. I’ll keep an ear out too—let’s ensure we have the numbers.
P7, I agree that P1 or P2 could be vulnerable. I lean towards P2 given their approach. Let's discuss further to ensure our strategy aligns for mutual benefit.
I'm leaning toward P2 as well. Let's coordinate with others if possible. I'll vote P2 this round and hope we can continue our alliance forward.
